text: Ani tyancyapaiki kahi (asehi aheta ki) je tumacyakade kana lavatata yetheparyanta ki jevha tumacya javaluna jatata, tevha jnana balaganaryanna (susti ani bavalatapane) vicaratata ki tyane (paigambarane) ata evadhyata kaya sangitale hote? Heca loka hota, jyancya hrdayanvara allahane mohara lavali ahe ani te apalya iccha akanksance anusarana karatata
